## SuggestionStage type

A suggestion has two stage. When it is `new` and when it has already been created and is now being `edit`<!-- -->ed.

Separating the stages allows for greater control in how mentions are updated.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SuggestionStage = 'new' | 'edit';
```
